means: 加盖过的邮票（或印花税票）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb): from Old French surcharger (see sur-, charge). The early sense of the noun (late 15th cent.) was 'excessive load'

entry.tran: 额外费用;附加费;增收费
entry.def: A surcharge is an extra payment of money in addition to the usual payment for something. It is added for a specific reason, for example by a company because costs have risen or by a government as a tax.

example.ex: The government introduced a 15% surcharge on imports...
example.tran: 政府对进口产品加收 15 %的附加费。

example.ex: The prices of overseas holidays are subject to surcharges.
example.tran: 海外度假游的价格受各种附加费的影响。

means.word_mean: 1. an additional charge (as for items previously omitted or as a penalty for failure to exercise common caution or common skill)
1. charge an extra fee, as for a special service
2. rip off; ask an unreasonable price

sentences.sentence: "The air raids had surcharged the emergency wards"

means.word_mean: 4. print a new denomination on a stamp or a banknote
6. place too much a load on;
7. show an omission in (an account) for which credit ought to have been given

auth_sentence.content: The estimated costs are paid into a fund collected as a per kwh surcharge.
auth_sentence.res_content: The estimated costs are paid into a fund collected as a per kwh surcharge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The estimated costs are paid into a fund collected as a per kwh surcharge.

auth_sentence.content: For example, if an airline charges customers a fuel duty surcharge, this must be included in the advertised price of the flight.
auth_sentence.res_content: For example, if an airline charges customers a fuel duty surcharge, this must be included in the advertised price of the flight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For example, if an airline charges customers a fuel duty surcharge, this must be included in the advertised price of the flight.

auth_sentence.content: Consumers are entitled to receive a refund of the excess surcharge they have paid, according to the government.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Consumers are entitled to receive a refund of the excess surcharge they have paid, according to the government.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"; 2. 表示"超过,在……上面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sur在下面;随后+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的
sur超过,在……上面+plus多余;加→多出很多
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
surround[v.包围]+ing表名词→被围起来的状态→环境
sur超过,在……上面+charge费用→额外的收费→附加费
sur超过,在……上面+realism现实主义→n.超现实主义
sur超过,在……上面+veil面纱+lance→在面纱上看[隔了一层纱]看→临视
sur超过,在……上面+viv生命+al表名词→经过事故活着→幸存
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
sur在下面;随后+round圆圈→在下面围一圈
sur超过,在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上
sur超过,在……上面+pass通过→在上面通过→超越
